short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turning TodoMVC into a Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TodoMVC wrapped in a Chrome extension. It's a dead-simple way to manage your todo list. Add tasks via a popup window on your menu bar or on the new tab page.

Please visit TodoMVC.com for more information.

You can  view the source at https://github.com/greysonp/todomvc-extension.

-- Version 1.2
* Did another update to the newest version of TodoMVC and fixed some text wrapping bugs!

-- Version 1.1
* Updated to the most recent version of TodoMVC. So much prettier!
